total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the locations of the number 1 in the input grid.
Q2: Shift the number 1 to the left by one cell.
Q3: Identify the locations of the number 2 in the input grid.
Q4: Shift the number 2 to the right by one cell.
Q5: Identify the locations of the number 4 in the input grid.
Q6: Shift the number 4 to the right by one cell.

Q3: Identify the locations of the number 2 in the input grid.
Q4: Shift the number 2 to the right by one cell.

Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 8s on all four sides.
Q2: If the cell is not 8, shift it to the left until it hits a cell that is not 8 or the edge of the grid.
Q3: Repeat the process for all cells that are not 8.
Q4: After shifting all cells, fill the empty spaces with 8s.
select_new_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 8s on all four sides.
Q2: If the cell is not 8, shift it to the left until it hits a cell that is not 8 or the edge of the grid.
Q3: Repeat the process for all cells that are not 8.
Q4: After shifting all cells, fill the empty spaces with 8s.
